name: Sruthi
wishText: Wishing you a day filled with magic, surprises, and endless joy!
text1: Hold on tight, because it's your birthday!!! 🎉🎈
textInChatBox: 🌟 Happy birthday to the extraordinary Sruthi!! 🌟 May this day bring you everything you've ever wished for!
text3: But then I got lost in a galaxy of birthday surprises.
text4: So I decided to wish you something truly extraordinary instead.
outroText: Hope your day is filled with wonder, laughter, and unforgettable moments!
replayText: Click here to experience the magic again!
